    http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1

    ValueWithAttributes RatePlanCode

      • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/Common/v4:StringShort
        • http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1:RatePlanCode

      • Description

        A string value may be used to request a particular code or an ID if the guest qualifies for a specific rate, such as AARP, AAA, a corporate rate, etc., or to specify a negotiated code as a result of a negotiated rate.
        Additional Documentation 
        Type Value
        Implementers Assigned XSD Type: {http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema}StringLength1to64

    • Example XML

      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>

<RatePlanCode promotionCode="L9Z" promotionVendorCode="WT1" ratePlanCategory="POD" ratePlanID="12345678" ratePlanQualifierInd="true" ratePlanType="Other_" ratePlanTypeExtension="ratePlanType_Other_Value" xmlns="http://www.opentravel.org/OTM/product/hospitality/v1">AAAB</RatePlanCode>

      Example JSON

      {
  "RatePlanCode" : {
    "value" : "AAAB",
    "ratePlanType" : "Other_",
    "ratePlanTypeExtension" : "ratePlanType_Other_Value",
    "ratePlanID" : "12345678",
    "ratePlanCategory" : "POD",
    "promotionCode" : "L9Z",
    "promotionVendorCode" : [ "WT1" ],
    "ratePlanQualifierInd" : true
  }
}

      • Attribute Summary

        Attributes 
        Name Description
        ratePlanType
        An enumerated type that allows the query to specify a rate category type, and provides major categories for comparison across brands.
        Details
        Type RatePlanType_Enum
        Example Value Other_
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        ratePlanID
        A text field used to indicate a unique ID that is associated with the rate plan and is essential in the reservation request in order to obtain the rate.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value 12345678
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        ratePlanCategory
        Hotel systems often group multiple rate plans into a single category. This refers to that category that is specific to the hotel CRS/ PMS and should not be confused with a GDS rate category.
        Details
        Type StringShort
        Example Value POD
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        promotionCode
        Used to provide a promotion code of the loyalty redemption.
        Details
        Type StringTiny
        Example Value L9Z
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1
        promotionVendorCode
        List of the vendor codes associated with a promotion.
        Details
        Type ListOfTinyStrings
        Example Value WT1
        Required false
        Pattern N/A
        Max Occurrences 1

      • Indicator Summary

        Indicators 
        Name Description
        ratePlanQualifierInd
        The Rate Plan Qualifier is used to control the sort order of RatePlans. Those Rate Plans that are not qualified will appear first, those that are qualified will appear last.
